content: 5 mm h crochet hook round 1 dmr 10 single_crochet 10 round 2 1 single_crochet in each st around 10 round 3-round 9 repeat round 2 10 copyright © 2012-2022 by oombawka design ltd all rights reserved no part of this publication may be reproduced distributed or transmitted in any form or by any means including photocopying recording or other electronic or mechanical methods without the prior written permission of the publisher copyright © 2022 oombawka design ltd newsletter | facebook | pinterest | instagram last minute reindeer candy cane holders 4 round 10 1 single_crochet through the first st and the 5th stitch this creates a center to the reindeer to hold the 2 candy canes more securely - see image below 1 single_crochet in each of the next 4 sts skip the next st which is the one you already crocheted through with the first stitch 1 single_crochet in each of the last 4 sts 9 r11 switch to your 4 mm crochet hook and work 1 single_crochet in each st around finish off with an invisible join and weave in your ends 9 tie a ribbon or piece of thread to the center stitch inside the reindeer the one you created when you worked through the first and fifth stitch in r10 then loop it through the front and back of the reindeer so the holder will balance when you hang it from the tree copyright © 2012-2022 by oombawka design ltd all rights reserved no part of this publication may be reproduced distributed or transmitted in any form or by any means including photocopying recording or other electronic or mechanical methods without the prior written permission of the publisher copyright © 2022 oombawka design ltd newsletter | facebook | pinterest | instagram
